name: Massage Bed Mat
descr:
Full Course Rolling Massage Mat.

Foldable with 16 wheel balls, back vibration, rolling and ponting massage.

Tender and comfort texture match with french velvet design, allow you to enter a whole new area of roller massage mate.

Light and compact body design, easy carrying property is the best choice for your to the enjoyment of burden free and easy life.

Including LCD remote control. 6 auto program from A-F. Time setting from 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 and 30 minutes. 5 level of vibrating intensity. Vibration for neck, back, waist, right thigh, left thigh and calves. Heating function and tapping function.

Specification: 93x55x30 cm and weight of 12,5 kg.
